metadata.title: CVE-2018-5818 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An error within the "parse_rollei()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp)within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 can be exploited to trigger aninfinite loop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.2-2
libraw19 - 0.19.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.2-2').
darktable package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
